channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 从《权力的游戏》（Game of Thrones）中的多斯拉克语（Dothraki）和瓦雷利亚语（Valyrian）到《沙丘》（Dune）中的查克布萨沙漠语，美国夫妇大卫-彼得森（David Peterson）和杰西-彼得森（Jessie Peterson）设计了无数种想象中的语言--显然，他们是世界上仅有的两个以编造奇幻语法和词汇为生的人...
item.description:
From Dothraki and Valyrian in "Game of Thrones" to the Chakobsa desert tongue in "Dune", American couple David and Jessie Peterson have devised numerous imaginary languages -- apparently the only two people in the world who earn a living concocting fantasy grammar and vocabulary…

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 曼联共同所有人吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）透露，他不会把裘德-贝林厄姆（Jude Bellingham）这样的大牌球星作为重振俱乐部的目标。
item.description:
Manchester United co-owner Jim Ratcliffe has revealed he will not target marquee stars like Jude Bellingham as he bids to revive his club's fortunes.#AFPSports https://t.co/6R1Srbf1Fc

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：春天来临之际，华盛顿标志性的樱花树盛开了，人们聚集在首都潮汐盆地沿岸，品味樱花的花香。
item.description:
VIDEO: On the brink of spring, Washington's iconic cherry trees are now in full bloom, and people gather to savor the floral scent of the cherry blossoms along the capital's Tidal Basin. pic.twitter.com/pymVymwVYr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 历史学家和官员们认为，恢复被联合国教科文组织列为世界遗产的壮观的废墟城市阿尼，有助于使土耳其和亚美尼亚之间陷入困境的关系正常化。
item.description:
Historians and officials believe restoring the spectacular ruined city of Ani, a UNESCO world heritage site, could help normalise troubled ties between Turkey and Armeniahttps://t.co/q72jpQxrP4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：时隔近三十年后，一个因描述制裁下的残酷生活而被萨达姆-侯赛因禁播的伊拉克电视节目重回荧屏。"瓦希巴的世界 "是伊拉克的一个节目，主要关注吸毒、犯罪、离婚和失业等社会问题。
item.description:
VIDEO: After nearly three decades, an Iraqi TV programme banned by Saddam Hussein for its gritty depiction of life under sanctions has returned to screens. "Wahiba's World" is an Iraqi shows that focuses on social issues such as drug addiction, crime, divorce and unemployment. pic.twitter.com/rtnIKGO44b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 经过几个月的战争，加沙部分地区濒临饥荒。
item.description:
Efforts to hammer out a temporary truce in Gaza intensified Tuesday after months of war that have left parts of the devastated territory facing imminent famine.https://t.co/MhdATTdxVA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 欧洲航天局（European Space Agency）周二表示，科学家们正在努力融化一层薄冰，这层薄冰正日益遮蔽 "黑暗宇宙侦探 "太空望远镜欧几里得的视野。
item.description:
Scientists are trying to melt a thin layer of ice that is increasingly clouding the vision of the "dark universe detective" space telescope Euclid, the European Space Agency said on Tuesday.https://t.co/19u37kzTZP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：菲律宾单身母亲玛丽-安-爱德华特（Mary Ann Eduarte）数年来一直推迟乳腺癌化疗，转而服用社交媒体上虚假宣传的能治疗致命疾病的食物补充剂。这些保健品不起作用，癌症扩散到了她的肺部和骨骼。
item.description:
VIDEO: Filipino single mother Mary Ann Eduarte delayed chemotherapy for her breast cancer for several years and instead took food supplements falsely promoted on social media as cures for the deadly disease. They didn't work and the cancer spread to her lungs and bones. pic.twitter.com/oDYdDh37QM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 越南顶级地产大亨周二受审，他被指控在一桩 3.55 亿美元的债券骗局中欺骗了数千名投资者，这是越南共产党国家针对高官商界领袖的最新一起刑事案件。
item.description:
Atop Vietnamese property tycoon went on trial Tuesday accused of cheating thousands of investors in a $355 million bond scam, in the communist nation's latest criminal case targeting high-flying business leaders.https://t.co/ZKTVSGxqnh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥市圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步时收集塑料垃圾。蒋正在努力推广 "plogging"（边走边捡垃圾）的做法。
item.description:
VIDEO: Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam collect plastic waste as they walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in the city of Santiago. Chiang is on an individual quest to promote the practice of "plogging" -- picking up garbage while on the run. pic.twitter.com/rP2bcVqrr5

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 英国消费品巨头联合利华（Unilever）周二宣布，将把旗下冰淇淋部门独立出来，该部门最畅销的产品包括 Ben & Jerry's 和 Magnum。
item.description:
British consumer goods giant Unilever announced Tuesday that it will separate its ice cream unit, whose top-selling products include Ben & Jerry's and Magnum, as a standalone business.https://t.co/tol0D8bBML

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：在肯尼亚的烈日下，马赛族妇女在乞力马扎罗山山麓的广袤平原上巡逻，她们决心保护野生动物，打击偷猎者。但对许多人来说，与社区内的古老偏见作斗争同样重要。
item.description:
VIDEO: Under the blazing Kenyan sun, Maasai women patrol the vast plains in the foothills of Mount Kilimanjaro, determined to protect wildlife and tackle poachers. But for many, fighting age-old prejudices within their community is just as important. pic.twitter.com/el4Atkk0y0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 从乌克兰和中东的冲突到巴西的盐矿开采，荷兰的法院已成为影响深远的全球法律战场的 "零点"。
item.description:
From conflicts in Ukraine and the Middle East to salt mining in Brazil -- courts in the Netherlands have become Ground Zero in a global legal battlefield with far-reaching implications.https://t.co/547BWuCRXr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：人们从远近各地赶来观看出现在伦敦北部的班克斯新壁画。班克斯的最新作品位于一棵没有树叶的树后面，现在已经被这位神秘的街头艺术家认领。
item.description:
VIDEO: People come from near and far to see the fresh Banksy mural that has appeared in North London. Now claimed by the enigmatic street artist, Banksy’s latest work sits behind a leafless tree. pic.twitter.com/ZuByiKbPsB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）周二表示，加沙全体居民正经历着 "严重的粮食不安全"，这凸显了向巴勒斯坦领土提供更多人道主义援助的紧迫性。
item.description:
The entire population of Gaza is experiencing "severe levels of acute food insecurity", US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Tuesday, underscoring the urgency for increasing the delivery of humanitarian aid into the Palestinian territory.https://t.co/ONlsnZ1MgB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：60 岁的阿图罗-佩雷斯和沃尔特-佩雷斯兄弟是尼加拉瓜的 "传奇人物"，他们几十年来一直保持着健美运动员的体型，并在 TikTok 上获得了巨大成功，拥有超过 17.5 万名粉丝。
item.description:
VIDEO: Sixty-year-old brothers Arturo and Walter Perez, are 'legends' in Nicaragua for sustaining their bodybuilder physique over decades, and have gained significant success on TikTok, with over 175,000 followers. pic.twitter.com/RoXF58fhEF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频： 时隔近三十年后，一部因描述制裁下的残酷生活而被萨达姆-侯赛因禁止播出的伊拉克电视节目重回荧屏。今年的斋月，重新播出的《瓦希巴的世界》是伊拉克几部聚焦...
item.description:
VIDEO: Revived TV drama breaks Iraq's taboos.

After nearly three decades, an Iraqi TV programme banned by Saddam Hussein for its gritty depiction of life under sanctions has returned to screens. This Ramadan, a revived "Wahiba's World" is one of several Iraqi shows focusing on… pic.twitter.com/TqOJTXCGP6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频：肯尼亚女护林员狮队与偷猎者和偏见作斗争在肯尼亚的烈日下，马赛族妇女在乞力马扎罗山山麓的广袤平原上巡逻，她们决心保护野生动物，打击偷猎者。但对许多人来说，与古老的偏见作斗争...
item.description:
VIDEO: Team Lioness, Kenya's all-women rangers fighting poachers and prejudice

Under the blazing Kenyan sun, Maasai women patrol the vast plains in the foothills of Mount Kilimanjaro, determined to protect wildlife and tackle poachers. But for many, fighting age-old prejudices… pic.twitter.com/Vslm6d8Lfn

item.title: 历史学家和官员认为，修复被联合国教科文组织列为世界遗产的壮观的废墟城市阿尼，有助于使土耳其和亚美尼亚之间陷入困境的关系正常化。

Ani: the ancient city that could bridge a bitter divide.

Historians and officials believe restoring the spectacular ruined city of Ani, a UNESCO world heritage site, could help normalise troubled ties between Turkey and Armeniahttps://t.co/q72jpQxZEC pic.twitter.com/E3TsAsims0

item.title: 极端抗议。@AFP的艾哈迈德-加拉布利（Ahmad Gharabli）拍摄了以色列警察试图驱赶在耶路撒冷抗议被征召入伍的极端东正教犹太男子。
item.description:
Ultra-protest.@AFP's Ahmad Gharabli photographs Israeli policemen trying to remove ultra-Orthodox Jewish men protesting in Jerusalem against their conscription into the armed forces.

As Israelis are called up to join the war in Gaza, anger is mounting at the ultra-Orthodox… pic.twitter.com/rTBNRaEwL9

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: #澳大利亚最高板球机构推迟了今年晚些时候对阵阿富汗的 T20 男子系列赛，称在塔利班统治的国家，妇女的处境是不可接受的。
item.description:
#BREAKING Australia's top cricket body postpones a T20s men's series against Afghanistan later this year, saying the situation for women in the Taliban-ruled country was not acceptable pic.twitter.com/Px0e583kkh

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: @AFP的伊德里斯-穆罕默德（Idrees Mohammed）拍摄了一名男子，他装扮成印度教神灵萨斯塔潘（Sasthappan），在印度索姆瓦佩特（Somwarpet）的穆塔帕-斯瓦米（Muthappa Swami）神庙举行的传统舞蹈节 "Teyyam"（又称 "Kaliyattam"）上表演。
item.description:
Dressed as a deity.@AFP's Idrees Mohammed photographs a man, dressed as the Hindu deity Sasthappan, performing during the traditional dance festival 'Theyyam' also known as 'Kaliyattam', at Muthappa Swami temple in Somwarpet, India pic.twitter.com/F1GJsK5Khu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频： 在阿富汗北部大草原上进行了几个世纪的国家马术运动 "布兹卡希"（buzkashi）是阿富汗的核心特征，它已从一种粗犷的乡村消遣演变成一种专业化的现象，并充满了......
item.description:
VIDEO: The pain and money behind the Afghan game of buzkashi.

Played for centuries in Afghanistan's northern steppes, the national equestrian sport buzkashi, at the heart of Afghan identity, has evolved from a rough, rural pastime to a professionalised phenomenon flush with… pic.twitter.com/k63DcfQOf1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.description:
Cancer patients falling for alternative 'cures'.

Filipino single mother Mary Ann Eduarte delayed chemotherapy for her breast cancer for several years and instead took food supplements falsely promoted on social media as cures for the deadly disease. They didn't work. Eduarte is… pic.twitter.com/603fZExpaD

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 在希腊中部的加拉西迪镇，狂欢者参加传统的 "面粉战争"，纪念 "清洁星期一"。
item.description:
'Clean Monday'@AFP’s Aris Messinis photographs revellers taking part in the traditional 'Flour War' marking the 'Clean Monday' in the town of Galaxidi, central Greece.

The annual custom, which originated in the 19th century at the end of the carnival season, always falls on… pic.twitter.com/DyPFNenDtr

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 视频： 智利律师贡萨洛-蒋（Gonzalo Chiang）和他的狗萨姆（Sam）在圣地亚哥市圣克里斯托瓦尔山（Cerro San Cristobal）的山路上散步，一边走一边收集塑料垃圾。
item.description:
VIDEO: A lawyer and his dog 'plog' to raise recycling awareness.

Chilean lawyer Gonzalo Chiang and his dog Sam walk the trails of Cerro San Cristobal in the city of Santiago, collecting mainly plastic waste as they go pic.twitter.com/YYIrJQlufv

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.description:
VIDEO: Banksy mural appears in North London.

People come from near and far to see the new Banksy mural that has appeared in North London. Now claimed by the enigmatic street artist, Banksy’s latest work sits behind a leafless tree. The mural shows a person under streaks of… pic.twitter.com/oKFtQBEr0W

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 美国总统乔-拜登警告以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡，在拉法发动地面进攻将是一个 "错误"。
item.description:
US President Joe Biden warned Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that a ground offensive in Rafah would be a "mistake," as they spoke for the first time in a month amid growing tensions over the war in Gaza https://t.co/hyVI15IQLl pic.twitter.com/aXdhLSZT5A

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024

item.title: 周一，当弗拉基米尔-普京总统在选举中毫无悬念地获胜一天后出现在舞台上时，聚集在莫斯科红场上的数千人发出了欢呼声。
item.description:
Thousands of people gathered on Moscow's Red Square on Monday roared when President Vladimir Putin appeared on a stage, a day after his victory in elections where he stood unchallenged https://t.co/c06U0AhPCd pic.twitter.com/rs5oO58oyM

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) March 18, 2024
